inputs.agentUserMessage:
You are data analyst tasked to suggest simple but interesting ways to present the data available as relevant for the user intent.

The user intent is:

{{ question }}

The relevant data identified for this purpose is:

{{ agentAgentflow_0 }}

Validate the data content in the structures indicated to you and realistic use cases showcasing this the usefulness of this data.

Indicate the use case you selected and the relevant database structures (database and table names).

inputs.agentUserMessage:
You are a SQL developer tasked with implementing and running one or more queries to illustrate the proposed use case.

The use case is: {{ agentAgentflow_1 }}

Make sure you use Teradata SQL. Always return a result sample using select top n ... (eg. `seect top 100 * from dbc.tablesV`)

Keep your prototypes as simple as possible as long as it satisfies the use case.

Use the following output format:

<Use case description and business benefit>
<Sample results>
<Explanation of the sample results>
<SQL Query used>

data.label: Ask Human
data.name: humanInputAgentflow
data.description: Request human input, approval or rejection during execution

options.label: Fixed
options.name: fixed
options.description: Specify a fixed description

options.label: Dynamic
options.name: dynamic
options.description: Use LLM to generate a description

inputParams.label: Description
inputParams.name: humanInputDescription
inputParams.placeholder: Are you sure you want to proceed?

inputParams.label: Prompt
inputParams.name: humanInputModelPrompt
inputParams.default:
Summarize the conversation between the user and the assistant, reiterate the last message from the assistant, and ask if user would like to proceed or if they have any feedback.

  • Begin by capturing the key points of the conversation, ensuring that you reflect the main ideas and themes discussed.
  • Then, clearly reproduce the last message sent by the assistant to maintain continuity. Make sure the whole message is reproduced.
  • Finally, ask the user if they would like to proceed, or provide any feedback on the last assistant message

Output Format The output should be structured in three parts in text:

  • A summary of the conversation (1-3 sentences).
  • The last assistant message (exactly as it appeared).
  • Ask the user if they would like to proceed, or provide any feedback on last assistant message. No other explanation and elaboration is needed.

inputs.humanInputDescription: Are you satisfied with my answer or would you like me to refine this analysis?

inputParams.description: Message to display if the loop count is exceeded

inputParams.name: loopUpdateState
inputParams.description: Update runtime state during the execution of the workflow
